text:
Hello
I have two questions.
---
１．
Is it possible to create a button to update a record?
For example, is it possible to create a functionality that when the Action buttons in the CRM action components are prepared and the button is pressed, the Lifecycle Stage of the contact is automatically updated to Opportunity?
Or is it not possible to create such a function since there is no such function in the UI extension components in the HubSpot Developer Docs?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components>
---
２．
I can create Action buttons in the custom tab of the contact, but can I create Action buttons in the 1's, 2's, etc. in the attached image?
I would like to develop the functionality for all records of a contact, not just for one record.
